original_title: Ο Άνθρωπος που Ενόχλησε το Σύμπαν
overview: A documentary focusing on two groups of mental patients. The first is located in the Mental Hospital of Chania and the daily life of patients is presented, their relationships, and their contact with reality. The second group, former patients, travels to Denmark in a rehabilitation journey.
title: The Man Who Disturbed the Universe
